channel.title: Emote help
channel.description: Ok well i'm adding in a ::sit command for admins on deltascape and i've got everything to work cept the sit graphic stops how do i make it so it doesn't stop showing ther person sit?

item.title: Emote help
item.dc:creator: @Goth_Wolf Goth Wolf
item.description:
@Goth_Wolf wrote:

i think you mean p.emote or is it actually pEmote lol and i’m not doing it through a else if command because it has some stuff u can’t add into regular commands in it

Read full topic

item.title: Emote help
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Idk if this will help but heres a perfect ::sit command:

         }

else if (command.startsWith(“sit”) && playerRights >= 0)
{pEmote = 2939;

Hope i helped.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2009, 09:34:41 am[/size][hr]Also, just add the permission for admins only at the top :P.

Read full topic
